summary: This is an email forwarding a signed unsealing order related to the Epstein case from July 2, 2020. It indicates a legal process to make documents public, with an attached PDF of the government's unsealing request and proposed order.

persons.name: Katharine Parker
persons.context: Appears as the sender of an email containing the unsealing order, using a nysd.uscourts.gov email address, indicating a role within the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Unsealing Order Signed
events.description: A court order to unseal documents in the Epstein case was signed and circulated via email.

keyFacts: An unsealing order was signed on July 2, 2020, related to the Epstein case.
The order was communicated via email from Katharine Parker of the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York.
The attached PDF file is titled '2020-07-02,GM,_government_unsealing_request_and_proposed_order.pdf'.
This correspondence is part of the legal process to make case documents publicly accessible.
